description: Summary Pipeline v9 Fixed - Full production configuration with all columns

column_transformations.name: acct_type_dtl_cd
column_transformations.expr: CASE WHEN acct_type_dtl_cd = '' OR acct_type_dtl_cd IS NULL THEN 999 ELSE acct_type_dtl_cd END

column_transformations.name: charge_off_am
column_transformations.expr: CASE WHEN charge_off_am IN (-2147483647, -214748364, -21474836, -1) THEN NULL ELSE charge_off_am END

column_transformations.name: credit_limit_am
column_transformations.expr: CASE WHEN credit_limit_am IN (-2147483647, -214748364, -21474836, -1) THEN NULL ELSE credit_limit_am END

column_transformations.name: emi_amt
column_transformations.expr: CASE WHEN emi_amt IN (-2147483647, -214748364, -21474836, -1) THEN NULL ELSE emi_amt END

column_transformations.name: balance_am
column_transformations.expr: CASE WHEN balance_am IN (-2147483647, -214748364, -21474836, -1) THEN NULL ELSE balance_am END

column_transformations.name: actual_payment_am
column_transformations.expr: CASE WHEN actual_payment_am IN (-2147483647, -214748364, -21474836, -1) THEN NULL ELSE actual_payment_am END

column_transformations.name: past_due_am
column_transformations.expr: CASE WHEN past_due_am IN (-2147483647, -214748364, -21474836, -1) THEN NULL ELSE past_due_am END

column_transformations.name: hi_credit_am
column_transformations.expr: CASE WHEN hi_credit_am IN (-2147483647, -214748364, -21474836, -1) THEN NULL ELSE hi_credit_am END

column_transformations.name: cash_limit_am
column_transformations.expr: CASE WHEN cash_limit_am IN (-2147483647, -214748364, -21474836, -1) THEN NULL ELSE cash_limit_am END

column_transformations.name: collateral_am
column_transformations.expr: CASE WHEN collateral_am IN (-2147483647, -214748364, -21474836, -1) THEN NULL ELSE collateral_am END

column_transformations.name: principal_write_off_am
column_transformations.expr: CASE WHEN principal_write_off_am IN (-2147483647, -214748364, -21474836, -1) THEN NULL ELSE principal_write_off_am END

column_transformations.name: settled_am
column_transformations.expr: CASE WHEN settled_am IN (-2147483647, -214748364, -21474836, -1) THEN NULL ELSE settled_am END

column_transformations.name: write_off_am
column_transformations.expr: CASE WHEN write_off_am IN (-2147483647, -214748364, -21474836, -1) THEN NULL ELSE write_off_am END

inferred_columns.name: orig_loan_am
inferred_columns.expr: CASE WHEN acct_type_dtl_cd IN ('5', '214', '220', '213', '224') THEN hi_credit_am ELSE credit_limit_am END

inferred_columns.name: payment_rating_cd
inferred_columns.expr: CASE WHEN days_past_due <= -1 THEN CASE WHEN asset_class_cd IN ('1', '01', 'S') THEN 'S' WHEN asset_class_cd IN ('2', '02', 'B') THEN 'B' WHEN asset_class_cd IN ('3', '03', 'D') THEN 'D' WHEN asset_class_cd IN ('4', '04', 'D') THEN 'L' WHEN asset_class_cd IN ('5', '05', 'M') THEN 'M' WHEN asset_class_cd IN ('0', '1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '6', 'G', 'L', 'C') THEN asset_class_cd ELSE NULL END WHEN days_past_due >= 0 THEN CASE WHEN days_past_due >= 0 AND days_past_due <= 29 THEN '0' WHEN days_past_due >= 30 AND days_past_due <= 59 THEN '1' WHEN days_past_due >= 60 AND days_past_due <= 89 THEN '2' WHEN days_past_due >= 90 AND days_past_due <= 119 THEN '3' WHEN days_past_due >= 120 AND days_past_due <= 149 THEN '4' WHEN days_past_due >= 150 AND days_past_due <= 179 THEN '5' WHEN days_past_due >= 180 THEN '6' ELSE NULL END END

rolling_columns.name: actual_payment_am
rolling_columns.mapper_expr: CASE WHEN actual_payment_am IN (-2147483647, -214748364, -21474836, -1) THEN NULL ELSE actual_payment_am END

rolling_columns.name: balance_am
rolling_columns.mapper_expr: CASE WHEN balance_am IN (-2147483647, -214748364, -21474836, -1) THEN NULL ELSE balance_am END

rolling_columns.name: past_due_am
rolling_columns.mapper_expr: CASE WHEN past_due_am IN (-2147483647, -214748364, -21474836, -1) THEN NULL ELSE past_due_am END
